rows.label: tlk70000020_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I spend a lot of time watching people
from here.

rows.label: tlk70000020_02_msg0002
rows.name:
It's helped me learn first-hand how
much stronger the bonds between
all of us grow after a disaster.

rows.label: tlk70000020_02_msg0003
rows.name:
A disaster may be just that, or it may
be something much more - a catalyst
for change. It all depends on us.

rows.label: tlk70000020_02_msg0004
rows.name:
The event in and of itself is not good or
evil. Only our actions and reactions can
be judged in that way.
